headline: Stocks to Watch Recap: Tesla, Bayer, AZEK, KB Home
summary: ↗️ Tesla (TSLA): Shares rose 12%, their biggest-one day gain since November. Monday's move built on gains made Friday, after Elon Musk urged employees not to sell shares in the EV maker at a meeting broadcast on his social-media platform, X.

headline: Why Robinhood (HOOD) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of financial services company Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) jumped 9.9% in the afternoon session after stocks rebounded (Nasdaq +2.0%, S&P 500 +1.5%) following a report from The Wall Street Journal stating that the Trump administration's reciprocal tariffs, to be announced on April 2, 2025, would be more narrowly targeted. headline: Exclusive-Massachusetts regulators probe Robinhood over March Madness basketball betting
summary: Massachusetts' top securities regulator has begun an investigation into trading platform Robinhood's decision to launch a prediction-markets hub that allows users to bet on the outcomes of a range of events, including March Madness college basketball tournaments.  Massachusetts Secretary of State Bill Galvin, in an interview with Reuters on Monday, said he was concerned that Robinhood was "linking a gambling event on a popular sports event that's especially popular to young people to a brokerage account."  "This is just another gimmick from a company that's very good at gimmicks to lure investors away from sound investing," said Galvin, a Democrat known as one of the country's most aggressive state-level securities regulators.

"This is just another gimmick from a company that's very good at gimmicks to lure investors away from sound investing," said Galvin, a Democrat known as one of the country's most aggressive state-level securities regulators.

headline: Tech stocks, crypto stocks, Super Micro Computer: Market Minute
summary: Yahoo Finance anchor Madison Mills examines the top stories kicking off Monday's trading day as part of today's Market Minute. Tech stocks, including Nvidia (NVDA), Advanced Micro Devices (AMD), and Meta Platforms (META), are rising amid the broader market rally on expectations that President Trump may soften his approach to anticipated tariffs. Crypto stocks, such as Coinbase (COIN), Strategy (MSTR), and Robinhood (HOOD), are seeing gains from bitcoin's (BTC=F) climb to the upside. Super Micro Computer (SMCI) is under pressure after Goldman Sachs (GS) downgraded the stock to Sell from Neutral and cut its price target to $32 from $40. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.
